attributes.title: I HATE THIS APP
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support our totally not racist homophobic narcissistic ignorant pig of a president😾😾 but somehow my pet fish found out! oh that silly liberal!!! my fish told me “acab” and “blm” and i got triggered because i am so selfish like every other trumpet🤢and i aggressively told him mean things. and guess what!?? my fish said that trump was a racist!!!!! and he totally isnt🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬 my fish even showed me evidence but i denied it because i refuse to view facts that hurt my ego😰😰😰😰 MY FISH THEN PROCEEDED TO JUMP OUT OF THE TANK AND DIE!!!!! all because of this app, my fish died. thanks alot president😡🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄!!!!! i know that u will continue to say sexist racist homophobic comments but i will still support because i will never acknowledge my white privilege nor my ignorance!! IF I COULD GIVE THIS APP 0 STARS I WOULD!!!!😾😾😾

attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: You are probably wondering whether or not you should get the app. But as you see from my one star rating...you shouldn’t. It took close to a year to download before it decided to. But it even had a few glitches that I wasn’t looking forward to. And it decided to offer me to buy some spaghetti. But I was like I don’t want no spaghett!!! So tell me why this stuff was sent in the mail the next day. But it took close to a year for the app to download😑! I was not amused. So I sent it right back to this secret location only for it to be sent back through airdrop. There sat the moldy spaghetti with a note saying VOTE TRUMP 2020. I would have to😩😩 only if the spaghetti didn’t come in the mail! I want warm spaghetti next time. NOT COLD AND MOLDY!!!

attributes.title: R.I.P my cactus plant, henry.
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to get notification about the  🍊 but then as i opened it , it’s glitched and kept going down. once i finally got it to work i then realized all the lies. nothing on here states that he is a racist, white supremacist who sexualized women and in many statements sexualized his own daughter. I then deleted the app and started having recurring nightmares. My last straw that made me restart my phone completely make a new apple ID was when i woke up to my poor cactus plant that had turned orange and began saying his disgusting quotes with a sign that said “grab her by the p*ssy”. i had to throw my favorite plant out of my window. So, now i don’t have my plant and a broken window. Don’t download, for the sake of your plants and sleep!

attributes.title: Absolutely Not.
attributes.review: I’m not mad, just disappointed.🤨 I had such high expectations and my heart just sank as soon as I opened the app.💔💔💔I wish I could give the app a 0 star rating⭕️. As soon as I opened the app, I could just sense an overwhelming feeling of homophobia😬😬pedophilia😷, racism 🥴and bigotry😯. As a positive and uplifting person, I was not having it. Please do not use this app🤮☹️🤢🤒😷unless you are trying to come down with the aforementioned diseases and especially if you are prone to such diseases🤒🤒🤒🤒🤒. I recommend downloading some healthy living apps🥬🍅🥒🥑🍑, maybe a daily motivation quote app📒📕, a brain game app 🧠🧠or anything else that will be of use and can contribute to your wellness in order to propel our society forward rather than backwards. 🥰🥰🥰

attributes.title: Can’t Believe This!!
attributes.review: This app was so incredibly stressful for me. I downloaded it hoping to get and show support for the president. Instead, I couldn’t figure it out, it kept glitching, and had me so stressed out that it gave me a UTI!! You know what a UTI is? It’s a URINARY TRACT INFECTION!!!! I had to go out in a MASK and get antibiotics and explain SHAMEFULLY to a pharmacist that the Trump 2020 app gave me an infection in my private parts. Then I only got given so much because healthcare made it too expensive for my young entrepreneurial free souled self. Turns out, if I don’t take enough antibiotics, I could DIE!!! It’s true, I learned it on Google, my doctor...Worst experience ever. Would NEVER recommend this app.... Everyone go give it ONE STAR. My name is Generation Z and I’m here to take this app down.😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😪

attributes.title: omg
attributes.review:
a literal douchbag. 
this app is horrible! my brother and i had nothing to do today so we sat under a tree. then i saw that donald trump had an app and i thought “Ferb! I know what we’re going to do today” we were going to build a machine that gets trump out of office. mean while, my secret agent platypus(perry) was trying to stop the evil dr. doofenschmirtz from making a make-me-president-inator. as we were making out machine, our friends came over to help, along with the girl scouts because girl power. periodt. overall, our machine worked and Dr. Doofenschmirtz inator did NOT work. the end. 

if only that could happen. the moral of the story is that trump cannot ban tik tok and should not be in office, and the electoral college should be abolished. THE END.  
have a great day :)

attributes.title: I Expected Much Better...
attributes.review: I was downloading this app to support the best president ever (in my opinion). When the app finally downloaded (it took about 2 hours because my WiFi is awful), the app wasn’t opening. I went to check my other apps to make sure that my iPhone wasn’t the problem, it wasn’t. I shut off my phone completely and turned it back on to then realize that it, fortunately, opened. Although, I was soon greeted with ads and glitches in the app and it was honestly difficult to maneuver. The application slowed my phone immensely and I was really disappointed to see that my favorite president had such an awful app. I’ll make sure to never download this again. Please do better, please....

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER DO NOT INSTALL
attributes.review: this app is awful i downloaded it and once i got onto the app it said their fish were gonna steal my microwave if i didn’t send them 2 million dollars. i obviously don’t have that much money so i couldn’t. i went on with my day figuring it was just a scam or something and then i go into my house later that day and not only is my microwave gone but they stole my toilet, sink, fridge, curtains, light bulbs, all the doors, and all of the ice cubes. i do not recommend getting this app under any circumstances. i repeat, DO NOT GET THIS APP unless you want government fish breaking into your house and stealing your microwave, toilet, sink, fridge, curtains, light bulbs, all the doors in your house, and all of the ice cubes. i wouldn’t even recommend this app to my worst enemy.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: So I download the app and they immediately try to steal the 96 kids in my basement and all the minion started attacking me and then he started eating the Bojangles I had gotten that day and also like my families downstairs and like when I was trying to kidnap them into my car even though I’m like five years old they like left me alone and like my name is Kim Jong Nam June and I’m from BTS and I love chicken or do you have a really bad obsession with One Direction go subscribe to PewDiePie PewDiePie is his arm awesome because he’s a good path of Apple support me a long black lives matter y’all and Hispanic lives matter also kids taste yummy anyways stream drag me down to 1 billion for their ten year anniversary. save Yemen and donate money to them help what they are going through .
